function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models for conservation activities due to pandemic","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resumption of funding to pre-pandemic levels cannot be guaranteed due to global financial downturns","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rushed government measures or societal backlash may harm conservation efforts","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in conservation monitoring and enforcement capacity due to restricted movements and postponed funding","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of inter-species transmission of contagious diseases in the cantanhez national park due to proximity between wildlife and humans","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced presence of international researchers leading to a potential lack of expertise and knowledge in conservation and wildlife management","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential economic impact on tourism-dependent economies like the seychelles due to reduced tourism activity","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of major conservation issues during the pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in conservation funding and government commitments due to economic downturn","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in conservation revenue and capacity, livelihood and trade disruptions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain government policy measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New variant of covid-19 driving increased transmission","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in virtual programs for smes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of financial support for entrepreneurship programs","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate government interventions for revitalizing the entrepreneurial ecosystem","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial vulnerability of small businesses","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic initiatives and government interventions","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for small business resilience","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resources and financial constraints create challenges in implementing resilient practices within smes, especially during a crisis.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of entrepreneurial orientation in firms","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation of socio-economic systems for future shocks","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges posed by the health crisis","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heightened focus on resilience","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Desire for autonomy, wealth, power, status, and personal achievement in entrepreneurship","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience and crisis management at the micro and macro levels may result in prolonged business closures and economic instability.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited management-level skill or qualification","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government-imposed health regulations","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High uncertainty level due to the ongoing crisis","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure on Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial spread of sars-cov-2 from patients to health-care workers due to ineffective personal protective equipment.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High loan default risk ratio npl/l","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of npl/l increase in the ’emergency stage’ due to unpredictable negative shock to unpredictable shock to gdp on npl/l in philippines banks","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Response of npl/l to shocks in malaysia
